general.description: This icy world has many valuable minerlas and materials locked underneath the kilometers of ice, so the Za'lek have set up a lare minin industry here. Unusually for a Za'lek world, there isn't as much of a scholarly presence here as thetre are on more densely populated worlds.
general.bar: This bar serves hot drinks and warm food, primarily soup to tired and cold workers. There is little else of note.
